title: Halloween 1, 2, and 4 movie novelizations
description:
These are the movie novelizations of the 1st, 2nd, and 4th Halloween films.

Halloween (1979) by Curtis Richards
Halloween II (1981) by Jack Martin
Halloween IV (1988) by Nicholas Grabowsky (Ultimate Edition)

These books, especially the first one, can be quite pricey and difficult to acquire. No official ebook exists so it is nice to have these available. I scrounged around on the internet and found these. I do not have a copy of the Halloween 3 novelization or the three Halloween spin-off novels, this is everything I have.

These are all in the Epub format. Enjoy
